title: The Ultimate Guide to Hair in Blender 3.3

media:group.media:title: The Ultimate Guide to Hair in Blender 3.3
media:group.media:description:
Switching to Blender for Experienced Artists:
https://flipnm.co/switchingToBlender

In this video tutorial about hair in Blender 3.3, you'll learn how to work with the new hair tools! Learn how to add hair,  using the density brush, comb brush, pinch brush, how to convert the hair to Particle Hair and much more!

Getting started with the hair tools - 01:00 
Geometry Nodes - 12:34
Converting to Particle System - 17:33

Einar Hair Scene File
